StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: SP_GETARTIC_V2
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE MVIALES.SP_GETARTIC_V2(
CURRESP OUT SYS_REFCURSOR
) AS BEGIN
OPEN CURRESP FOR
SELECT TA.DESCRIPCION FROM T_ARTICULOS TA;
END;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE MVIALES.SP_GETARTIC_V2(
CURRESP OUT SYS_REFCURSOR
) AS BEGIN
OPEN CURRESP FOR
SELECT TA.DESCRIPCION FROM T_ARTICULOS TA;
END;
